column2: but weren't as wonderful as the meat
column4: right?  The beans were delicious.  I liked the BBQ sauce
column5: though it was a bit too sweet for me.  (I generally prefer a bit more of a "zesty zing"  in my BBQ sauce that wasn't present here.). The coleslaw and fries were both okay
column6: but I wasn't as impressed with then as the meat.  However
column7: the young children definitely enjoyed the fries.  I liked the macaroni and cheese as a side
column8: though the kids liked it less.
